segments.text: Happy birthday , John . Many happy returns of the day !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you , Alice . Come in to the dining-room . I ’ m going to cut the cake soon . Have some please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok . I ’ m pretty happy and I can go abroad .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . We hope your wish will come true .
segments.speaker: S1
